attributes.additional_details: It’s all over the internet that Brooklyn nine nine is being cancelled but it’s the funniest show (in my opinion) ever, it’s got comedy, drama and police work that’s really all I want. Jake and Charles are hilarious and each character brings their own different type of comedy to the show, if enough of us sign this petition this could show the producers we love this show
attributes.background: It’s being be said that Brooklyn nine nine is being cancelled because of low views, however me and a lot of people love the show it’s brought me happiness and laughter when I need it the most.
